message:
Confirm object synset assignment.
Object assigned to synset: microwave.n.01
Definition: a short electromagnetic wave (longer than infrared but shorter than radio waves); used for radar and microwave ovens and for transmitting telephone, facsimile, video and data
Reminder: synset should match the object and not its contents.
(e.g. orange juice bottle needs to match orange_juice__bottle.n.01
and not orange_juice.n.01)
